# Exp
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Excel EXP(number): Returns e raised to the power of the given number.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `EXP`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
